sn46.46:1.1: “Sir, they speak of someone who is ‘poor’.
sn46.46:1.2: How is a poor person defined?”
sn46.46:1.3: “Mendicant, they’re called poor because they haven’t developed and cultivated the seven awakening factors.
sn46.46:1.5: The awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity.
sn46.46:1.6: They’re called poor because they haven’t developed and cultivated these seven awakening factors.”
